TextBody:
Jim,

Per our call today we confirmed that the current version of application(s) running in the Test Environment:

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                   11.6.0.43
NEA Access Information Center (AIC)            11.6.0.6 

Ran my SA_Upgrade_Prep setting the output path to E:Temp

Scheduling Link
nwxcorp.my.salesforce-sites.com/cts?Id=pmH_proRP7Vs8bePVKcmjogB8YBSMxjQtBgPZ1SXbGo-Z&MeetingID=QirKisfNuJ8jGvwq9MEVWEtLeaxSMt5IV9DFxNShzJs-Z

For this 90min Upgrade meeting, we will need to have a Full backup (internal procedures) & Admin access of the following
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA) formally StealthAUDIT (SA) Server and Related SQL DB

Day of the meeting Download and unblock
Then copy over to the Server. netwrix.com/my_products_int.html
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                11.6.0.135+
NEA Access Information Center (AIC)         11.6.0.37+

Please join from your Workstations to avoid any UAC issues on the Server:
***NOTE*** The invite may not set the meeting reminder please adjust within your calendar once the Time is agreed on.

Referenced the following:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Solutions > File System Solution
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Solutions/FileSystem/Overview.htm
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Requirements > File System Solution > File System Supported Platforms > Dell Isilon/PowerScale Target Requirements > Dell Isilon/PowerScale Activity Auditing Configuration https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/Config/DellPowerScale/Activity.htm
^^^ This does require an agent to be deployed to a Windows Host via the Netwrix Activity Monitor (NAM) formally Stealthbits Activity Monitor (SAM) Server
Netwrix Activity Monitor v8.0 > Administration > Monitored Hosts Tab > Add New Host Window > Dell Isilon/PowerScale
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/ActivityMonitor_8.0/page/Content/ActivityMonitor/Admin/MonitoredHosts/Add/DellPowerScale.htm

Again, thank You for your time.

Dusty Grayson
Sr. Support Engineer
Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
____________________ __________
Cybersecurity That Works for You.
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100,Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com

*****Please note Support communication changes*****
Directly emailing Support Engineers is likely to result in oversight, as they do not handle cases through email correspondence.
It is recommended to use the Support Portal for appropriate communication channels. https://www.netwrix.com/sign_in.html?rf=my_tickets.html

Emailing into support@stealthbits.com has been disabled as well.

TextBody:
Jim,

Per our call today we upgraded the current version of Stealth application(s) running in the Test Environment:

FROM:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                   11.6.0.43
NEA Access Information Center (AIC)            11.6.0.6 

TO:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                   11.6.0.137
NEA Access Information Center (AIC)            11.6.0.37 

Following:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Installation > Installation & Configuration Overview > Enterprise Auditor Console Upgrade
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Upgrade/Overview.htm
Netwrix Access Information Center 11.6 > Installation Overview > Upgrade Procedure
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_11.6/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Upgrade.htm

SQL Auth:
Netwrix Access Information Center 11.6 > Installation Overview > Permissions
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_11.6/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Overview.htm#permissions 

Additional reference links you might like:
NEW Netwrix Community https://community.netwrix.com/


I will close out this ticket as noted.

We have 30days to reopen once the closure email is received.

To reopen we can just reply to that email to bring the case back into my queue.

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. 

Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link.

Have a great weekend.

Again, thank You for your time.

Dusty Grayson
Sr. Support Engineer
Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
